== dictionaries/rougail/01-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
variable:
  redefine: true
  disabled: false
----
== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
condition: no    # a condition
variable:
  description: a variable
  disabled:
    jinja: |
      {% if _.condition == "yes" %}
      true
      {% else %}
      false
      {% endif %}
----
